definition: to wait/to treat/to deal with/to need/going to (do sth)/about to/intending to
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb

sentences.english: He is straight in his dealings.
sentences.chinese: 他在待人接物方面正直老實。

sentences.english: It's time somebody taught you to behave yourself.
sentences.chinese: 現在該有人教導你如何待人接物了。

sentences.english: Finally, don't make the mistake of treating people according to their social standard.
sentences.chinese: 最後，不要在待人接物方面犯勢利小人的錯誤。

sentences.english: It is (high) time that somebody taught you to behave yourself.
sentences.chinese: 早該有人教你如何待人接物了。

definition: to be of service to others/to help others/benevolent
to work/to handle matters/to have a job
to train/to educate/to bring up/to nurture/education/culture/upbringing/early conditioning
worldly wisdom/the ways of the world/to know how to get on in the world
words and actions/what one says and what one does
to conduct oneself/to behave with integrity
